page.title: 13ELLESMERE PORT-THE PLAYBUS.
page.content: The Playbus is an ordinary double- decker bus converted to accommodate a pre-school playgroup with toys,books, games,sand,paints & basic crafts.It has nine sessions a week during the school term and is staffed by three paid helpers including a teacher.The rest of the work is done by parents as a charity group.At present 58 children attend & there is a long waiting list. Working in such confined space,with a ratio of five children per adult,there is an infant class atmosphere where children can be taught basic skills in preparation for school.This includes a certain amount of discipline and the social aspect of co-operation.Children are taught an awareness of texture, colour,weather & time of year etc.They make their own cards & presents for special days.There are only nineteen registered playbuses in Great Britain.
